name: places/ChIJh3jaTqBZwokRndEXUwQhjbE
formattedAddress: 30 Central Park S # 2c, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: 30 Central Park S # 2c, New York, NY 10019-1628, USA

originalText.text:
I cannot begin to thank Dr. Sangwan and the staff at Central Park Dentistry enough for my perfect teeth!  I'm thrilled with the results after a year of having braces.
I had braces as a child but one tooth in the front turned almost sideways over the years.
Dr. Sangwan was confident that it could be corrected.  She is very knowledgeable and took great care at every appointment to really think through the movement of my teeth.  I felt well cared for and important as a patient.  She had infinite patience for all my questions and concerns.  That she is an interesting, friendly person was an unexpected bonus.
The staff was wonderful and made sure I was comfortable during every appointment.  Everyone was pleasant and easy to work with.
I am delighted with my smile and grateful for the excellent care I received!

originalText.text:
I had an exceptional experience at this dental office during my Invisalign treatment. The team provided comprehensive explanations and detailed information about the process. Dr. Sangwan, the orthodontist I worked with, was outstanding. Her patience and dedication ensured I was always satisfied with my Invisalign progress. The entire office staff, especially Margaret, who clearly outlined costs and simplified the administrative process, contributed to a seamless experience. This office has become my go-to for all dental needs, thanks to its wide range of specialists. I highly recommend their services.

P.S. The view of Central Park from some of the dental rooms is a delightful bonus.

originalText.text:
Dr. Sangwan has been my main orthodontist for these past two years and there’s no one else I would recommend! She’s very knowledgeable, precise, and will always strive for perfection. Although it is still a work in progress, I’ve already seen heaps of progress - (Including correcting my raised canine, cross bite, and overall tooth arrangement) and I’m well on my way to get my dream smile :)

Not only so, all the staff at Central Park Dentistry is extremely accommodating and friendly! If you are in need of Dentistry or Orthodontics, I highly recommend you check this place out!

originalText.text:
Parul Sanghwan - Genuinely reliable and a very good orthodontist. Would recommend anyone who has issues and wants to visit an orthodontist.

It's simply amazing how the staff and doctor make the patients very comfortable within no time!
Extremely satisfied with the service!

Centrsl park dentistry - They have other dental services and other doctors as well in central park dentistry. It has impeccable staff and doctors who give you a top class service and get your beautiful smile back!!:)

originalText.text: I had an excellent experience with Dr. Parul Sangwan. Her clinical skills are top-notch, and she has a remarkable ability to put patients at ease. I appreciate her honesty and straightforward approach to my treatment. I highly recommend her for anyone seeking orthodontic care.
